```{r table1}

library(reactable)
library(htmltools)

appl <- data.frame(c("Copper","Nickel","Zinc"),
                   c("6.0 to 8.5","6.0 to 8.0","6.7 to 8.1"),
                   c("Not specified","3.7 to 88","Not specified"),
                   c("Not specified","3 to 72","Not specified"),
                   c("2 to 340","22 to 516","26 to 370"),
                   c("0 to 30","0.5 to 17","0.5 to 15"))

names(appl) <- c("Dissolved Metal", "pH", "Calcium (mg/L)", "Magnesium (mg/L)", "Hardness (mg/L as CaCO<sub>3</sub>)",
                 "DOC (mg/L)")

dt_appl <- reactable(appl,
                     defaultColDef=colDef(headerStyle=list(background="#bacdda"), html=TRUE),
                     rowStyle = function(index){
                           if (index == 3){
                             list(borderBottom="1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)")
                           }
                         }
                     )


dt_appl <- htmlwidgets::prependContent(dt_appl, 
    p("Table 3. Applicability ranges of water chemistry variables for copper, nickel and zinc", style="font-size:80%"))

dt_appl

```
